name: LightShot
description:
A platformer inspired by mario with a twist added for the theme Light. Levels 1 and 2 introduce the mechanics. The rest are where hell can break loose.

Try getting the highest score possible for each level by killing all enemies.

Controls:

  • Use A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys to move
  • Use SPACE to jump
  • Use Q to shoot
  • Use E to change gravity when you acquire the switch

Project Source: Rud156 - LightShot

Feedback and Comments are highly appreciated.
